All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AIPlayer
This class implements AI player behavior
AudioManager
This class implements the audio manager to play audio samples
Avatar
Enumeration of the various player avatars
AvatarPicker
This class implements the avatar picker
AvatarTextureMap
This class implements the avatar texture map
Card
This class implements game cards
Card.Color
Enumeration of card colors
Card.Type
Enumeration of card types
CardRect
This class represents a pixel region on which a card is present
CardTextureMap
This class implements the texture map for cards
Deck
This class implements the game deck
DropPile
This class implements the pile of dropped cards
Frame
This class implements the main application frame
Frame.Panel
Enumeration for displayable panels
GameManager
This class implements various game mechanics such as card distributing, player turns and victory
GameRecord
This class implements a game record
GameResetEvent
This class implements a game reset event
GameScreen
This class implements the game screen
GameScreenClickListener
This class implements the listener for player clicks on the game screen
GameScreenDraw
This class implements the game screen drawing area
GameToolbar
This class implements the toolbar shown above the game screen
HumanPlayer
This class implements the human player
IncompatibleCardException
Exception thrown when the player chooses an incompatible card
JUno
This class contains the main method
MainMenu
This class implements the main menu
MenuNavigationEvent
This class implements the event that is triggered by menu navigation
NavigationPanel
This class implements a JPanel that has a built in MenuNavigationEvent
NoCompatibleCardsException
Exception thrown when a player has no compatible cards
Player
This class implements basic player behavior for both AI and human
PlayerAudioFeedback
This class gives audio feedback on player actions
PlayerControlled
This class is an empty placeholder for the human player, which does not play by its own
PlayerNotReadyException
Exception thrown until the player chooses a card
PlayerProfile
This class implements player profiles
PlayStrategy
Interface for player card picking behavior
ProfileEditor
This class implements the profile editor form
ProfileRandomizer
This class implements a random profile generator
RandomPicking
This class implements random card picking for AI players
